description:
Easy to apply with a quick swipe, keeping sandy hands from providing unwanted exfoliation. It protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays, while enriching your skin with vitamin E. Whether you're on a tropical beach, or out in the backyard, Sum Bum does its part to help keep you sun-safe.

  • Stick format is easy to apply to wriggly tiny humans
  • Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Water resistant rating of 80 minutes
  • Gluten, paraben, and petroleum free
  • Ingredients: avobenzone 2.00%, homosalate 15.00%, octinoxate 7.50%, octisalate 5.00%, ascorbyl palmitate, beeswax, bht, cetyl alcohol, ethylhexyl palmitate, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, fragrance, ozokerite, paraffin, polyester-8, polyethylene and tocopheryl acetate
name: Sun Bum SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick 13g
